title: Small Carousel Suggestion - Send players back to origin spot after selecting champ
body: After someone chooses a champ from the carousel, they should be sent back to their origination spot. Nothing feels worse than trying to go after a certain champ when other players are just sitting in the circle making it hard to see the champs and getting in the way. XD

replies.body:
I think that's considered part of the strategy (Tactics) of the game. There are people who will actually run around bumping into people as they are trying to pick their champ, just to knock them off. I've even saw a player named something like "oopsbumpedyou" doing just that constantly.

So I don't think Riot'll change that.

Meh, I think it's a lame part of the game if it is intended.

You already get porked enough by getting last picks or having what you want rotate to the opposite side, adding even more frustration with hit boxes and blocking view just isn't needed IMO.

> You already get porked enough by getting last picks or having what you want rotate to the opposite side, adding even more frustration with hit boxes and blocking view just isn't needed IMO.

I agree with ya man. If this was 'supposed' to be this way, I think it's dumb. Get your pick and get out XD.

They did MASSIVELY reduce your hitbox, so it's a ton harder to disrupt people by bumping.  A lot of people do still run around just to clutter everything up, and considering your huge health bar is placed in front of all the champions, you can cover up a champs item permanently with a little skilled following...

This needs to be changed for sure.
